${ModID}:HermesSwiftStrike.NAME: Hermes's Swift Strike
${ModID}:HermesSwiftStrike.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack is played twice.

${ModID}:AresCurseOfAgony.NAME: Ares's Curse Of Agony
${ModID}:AresCurseOfAgony.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Doom. NL All Enemies lose HP equal to their *Doom.

${ModID}:AresCurseOfPain.NAME: Ares's Curse Of Pain
${ModID}:AresCurseOfPain.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Doom to ALL enemies. NL All Enemies lose HP equal to their *Doom.

${ModID}:AresImpendingDoom.NAME: Ares's Impending Doom
${ModID}:AresImpendingDoom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! ${ModID}:Doom. NL All Enemies lose HP equal to their *Doom.

${ModID}:AresAid.NAME: Ares's Aid
${ModID}:AresAid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Deals damage an additional time for each *Ares card played this combat.
${ModID}:AresAid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Deals damage an additional time for each *Ares card played this combat.

${ModID}:AresViciousCycle.NAME: Ares's Vicious Cycle
${ModID}:AresViciousCycle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs !M! less for each attack played this turn.

${ModID}:AphroditeBlownKiss.NAME: Aphrodite's Blown Kiss
${ModID}:AphroditeBlownKiss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:AphroditeSweetSurrender.NAME: Aphrodite's Sweet Surrender
${ModID}:AphroditeSweetSurrender.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable equal to target enemy's Weak.

${ModID}:AphroditeDyingLament.NAME: Aphrodite's Dying Lament
${ModID}:AphroditeDyingLament.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:PoseidonAid.NAME: Poseidon Aid
${ModID}:PoseidonAid.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain Block an additional time for each *Poseidon card played this combat.
${ModID}:PoseidonAid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block !M! times. NL Gain Block an additional time for each *Poseidon card played this combat.
